ou3

Class AgentMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • ou3.Message
      • ou3.AgentMessage

  • public class AgentMessage
extends Message
    The Class AgentMessage, creates an agentmessage. Holds a long lifelenght. Forwards information as it gets sent around the network. Contains a table with events and paths to them.
